endpoints.description: Retrieve a list of all associated insurance policies for the user.
Fetch details about a specific insurance policy by its identifier.
Initiate the renewal process for a specified insurance policy.
Submit a new insurance claim for review and processing.
Obtain details regarding a specific insurance claim identified by its Claim ID.
Update previously submitted insurance claim information.
Review coverage details applicable under multiple insurance policies.
Submit user feedback or comments pertaining to the insurance services.
Access the user's notification history related to policy updates and claims.
Request the removal of a specific policy from the user's active policies, if applicable.
